front.title: SCTP based TML (Transport Mapping Layer) for ForCES protocol

abstract.t: This document defines the SCTP based TML (Transport Mapping Layer) for the ForCES protocol. It explains the rationale for choosing the SCTP (Stream Control Transmission Protocol) [RFC2960] and also describes how this TML addresses all the requirements described in [RFC3654] and the ForCES protocol [FE-PROTO] draft.
